Welcome to ORGANIC's documentation!
===================================
**ORGANIC** (**O**\ bject **R**\ econstruction with **G**\ eneral **A**\ dverserial **N**\ etworks from **I**\ nterferometri\ **C** data), is a Python package that uses neural networks to reconstruct images
from the data provided by modern optical interferometry observatories (VLTI, CHARA etc.). You can read the ORGANIC API below.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   organic
